profile.name: Nicol√°s
profile.title: Linux is better than Windows
profile.description: I am a sysadmin, DevOps. I know Linux and Windows too, but I prefer Linux to Windows. Not only that, but I like to program in bash, python, and I am learning to program in Kotlin using android studio. Furthermore, I love to learn all days.

interestingFacts.topic: Learn about any subject of study that interests me such as: computer science in general, art, history, science, video games, technologies, mysteries of humanity, archaeology, mythology, psychology, cryptocurrencies, investments, mathematics, music, etc.
interestingFacts.fact:
For examples:
Linux distributions, internet trends, what is the blockchain, relationship between mathematics and music, appreciating the beauty of art, what happened to a certain civilization, offers on steam, cryptocurrency market, why people behave in a certain way or other, body language, etc.
